dublin_core.dcvalue: As more children use mobile cellular telephones public anxiety grows about the possible adverse health effects of radiofrequency RF exposure upon developing nervous systems Most epidemiological studies investigating the health effects of mobile telephones have relied on self reports from questionnaires While there are some validation studies investigating the accuracy of self reported mobile phone use in adults and adolescents self reported laterality of use has not been validated at any age Although this study mainly sought to validate the accuracy of self reported laterality of mobile telephone use in adolescents investigation also covered number and duration of calls
A new method to determine laterality of mobile telephone use in adolescents.
